name: Wolf with Animations
description:
Here is my low-poly wolf model with some basic animations.

Just a test how it works on Poly.

I modeled, textured and rigged this wolf in Blender-3D 2012.

Wolf animations:

1. Walk cycle
2. Run cycle
3. Sit
4. Creep animation
5. Idle animation

Test in Unity 5
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztQ6sMVhUZ0

Test in Unreal 4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GqZs8_5roaM

Downloads:

*   https://3dhaupt.com/3d-wolf-rigged-low-poly-and-game-ready-download-walk-cycle-run-sit-creep-idle-animation/
